tool_description: Calculates projected and actual revenues from licensing deals based on various financial models, including minimum guarantees, revenue shares, and performance bonuses.

calculation_type.description: Type of calculation: projection, actual, comparison

revenue_model.description: Revenue model: flat_fee, revenue_share, minimum_guarantee_plus_share, performance_based

base_amount.description: Base amount for calculation (minimum guarantee, flat fee, etc.)

error_messages: Invalid license ID: License agreement not found.
Invalid calculation type: Use one of [projection, actual, comparison].
Invalid revenue model: Use one of [flat_fee, revenue_share, minimum_guarantee_plus_share, performance_based].
Invalid financial amounts: All monetary values must be non-negative.
Invalid revenue share rate: Rate must be between 0 and 100.
Missing required data: Gross revenues required for revenue share calculations.
Invalid currency code: Use valid ISO 4217 currency code.
usage: Provide license_id, calculation_type, revenue_model, and base_amount. Include additional parameters based on the revenue model selected. Tool calculates total revenues and provides detailed breakdown.

payment_schedule.description: Suggested payment schedule based on agreement terms
